page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE
page.content: I went to ballet on Friday night in Burgess Hill.When I returned I changed in to my Guide uniform and went to Guides.I went home at 7.30 and watched T.V. with my mother and Donna until 9.30.I woke up at 8.00. On Saturday I changed in to Guide uniform and went to the village hall to attend the Guide sale. We raised Â£75. We came home.Mum and my sister Donna went to the pub to meet my dad.In the morning he was buying parts for the car.I got changed and had a quick lunch andwent to meet them. We went to Plumpton Coaches to spray mum's car. Donna and I went shopping with mum and came home to watch TV before going to bed.On Sunday I went to chapel,helped Sarah, went on a bike ride, then I went home and recorded records off the radio, watched TV and went to bed.
